adept.common
Class Script

java.lang.Object
  adept.common.Item
      adept.common.HltContent
          adept.common.Script

public final class Script
extends HltContent

Represents a generic pattern of events with some relation to one another. For example, "criminal justice proceedings", which would involve charges, arrests, trials, sentenceings, etc.

All script-related classes are "locally immutable" so long as the IType implementation used is. However, they all inherit from the mutable HltContent class, whose associated fields are mutable. The Object.hashCode() and Object.equals(Object) implementations are the default.
